title: Furnished 1 Bedroom for Rent (all utilities included)
description:
1 Bedroom / 1 Bath fully furnished + all utilities included, with resident-only swimming pool
Available September 1st! Beautiful, Fully-Furnished 1-bedroom apartment with south and east-facing exposures, high ceilings, and updated kitchen and bathroom. Truly unbeatable location on the beautiful tree-lined Spruce Street, close to both the Market-Frankford Line (11th Street) and Broad Street (Walnut/Locust) subway stops. Step into this historical 1870s brownstone and enjoy its generous layout, including oversized living room with original thin-plank walnut floors, full kitchen with updated appliances, including gas stove and dishwasher, as well as a new built-in bookshelf / pantry combination, and a large bedroom with two full-size closets and black-out blinds.
Apartment 3R provides unmatched convenience paired with the peace and quiet of an upper level rear-unit. You’ll be less than a 10 minute walk from Whole Foods, Acme, Mom’s Organic, Walgreens, and Target. Within a 15 minute walk, you’ll have access to shopping and entertainment along Walnut or South Street, a host of Midtown Village restaurants, Market East shopping district, as well as City Hall. One of Philadelphia’s original four squares, Washington Square Park, as well as the historic Independence Mall, are minutes from your front door. Seger Park, a hidden gem, with its coveted Center City recreation facilities is also just around the corner. The building has access to two courtyards, and a seasonal heated pool open to all residents. Secure mail and package areas with recently updated on-site laundry facilities add to the convenience.
Security Deposit, Last Month's Rent, and small Move-In Fee required. 1-year lease required, not available for short term rental. Per association by-laws, only cats will be allowed on a case-by-case basis. All utilities are included in the rental price, see below for details.

title: REDUCED! FISHTOWN 3 story, 3 bedroom, 2 full bath
description:
Available September 2022!
This beautiful and fully furnished, three-story home is located in the heart of Fishtown, which Forbes Magazine described as one of the best neighborhoods to live in the U.S.!
The home has a recently remodeled kitchen with a ton of natural lighting, stainless steel appliances, a built in dishwasher and a wrap around counter for eating, working or hanging out.
There is hard wood flooring throughout the home with a smart Nest thermostat which operates the gas heat and electric central air conditioning. Water is included in your rent. There is full semi-finished basement for storage and laundry.
The patio is also in the process of an update, with a new Moroccan style, tiled wall being built behind the large seated area. Included are older and recent pictures of the yard to give you a sense of the space.
There are a total of three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The second floor has one large bedroom with a double bed, TV, dresser, computer desk and chair. The second smaller bedroom includes a futon bed, small wardrobe, and desk. There is a as full bathroom located on the second floor.
The third floor master bedroom runs the entire length of the house and also has it's own newly renovated full bathroom with a large soaking bathtub. The third floor master bedroom includes a queen bed, TV, two wardrobes and a treadmill.
This listing is furnished, but if you prefer unfurnished, let us know!
Parking:
There's street parking available with no time limit and no permit required.
We are walking distance to the Market-Frankford line, which will quickly take you to Center City, University City, Old City, South Philly, and more ($2.25 token fee). Lyft and Uber are always nearby and typically arrive in ~3 minutes. We are also close to I 95 as well.
Popular nearby:
Fishtown is one of the best neighborhoods in Philly! We are walking distance to some of the greatest cafes, bars and restaurants in both Fishtown and Northern Liberties:

MAKE A CALL 40 85 087 812

Relax in the extra deep soaking tub and enjoy the mosaic tile work and custom bathroom vanity with a quartz countertop. title: Roomy 1BR in Glenside triplex-800 sf
description: Make this roomy, light-filled, comfortable 1 BR apt in a 3-story Glenside triplex your home.  Bickley Road is a tree-lined street conveniently located close to Arcadia, the Glenside train station, shops, restaurants, Keswick Village. 154 Bickley Road was built in 1915, and still has some original architectural features. This 2nd floor apt boasts 2 entrances, one via the front door on the charming porch, the other via the fire escape leading to a door in the kitchen.  Ample off-street parking in the rear. The large kitchen has recessed lighting, newer appliances, including a dishwasher, and, best of all, a stacked washer and dryer tucked away in a closet in the kitchen. There are 2  bay windows in the apt - one in the bedroom, one in the living room. The large bedroom has 2 big closets. Wall to wall carpet in the living room and bedroom. Vinyl plank flooring in the kitchen and bathroom. Vinyl replacement windows throughout, with mini-blinds.  Quiet location and building ideal for working from home. 2 window AC units provided. Tenant pays for gas and electric.  Landlord pays for water, sewer, lawn care. Available 8/1 or sooner.  1 cat or small dog will be permitted. Please provide info regarding desired move-in date, who the apt is for, and monthly income when responding.  This is a non-smoking building. Coming soon - the first floor unit in the same building - 2 bedrooms with new vinyl plank flooring throughout and door in kitchen leading to new washer/dryer in basement.  Available mid-August @ $1475.

title: Amazing Opportunity to Live at Croydon!
description:
Where luxury city living reaches new heights, come see what we have to offer!
Unique Features
- Online Resident Portal
- Secure Entry with FOB access
- Individual Climate Control
- Enclosed Community Courtyards with a gazebo, firepit, and lawn games
- Free Bicycle Storage and Free Air for bike tires
- Playroom for the kids
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
The Community
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Avenue, multiple coffee shops, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- Taking public transportation? There are two bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) with the MFL station being just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with free indoor bicycle racks!
Apartment 107 is a fully renovated 2 bedroom, 1 bath located within the iconic Croydon Hall. The partment comes with amazing views, tons of light, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, PTAC heating and cooling which you control, and a bathroom equipped with a rainfall shower head, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes. What's not to love?
Monthly Rent: $1,500.00
Application Fee: $50 per applicant
Square Footage: 610 Sq Ft
Lease Term: Flexible - Just ask!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, and Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $19.99/month
The Amenities
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Loading Zone in front of building for all your shopping needs
- Recently renovated all hours Laundry Room with card or app access!
- 24 Hour Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building
- Lounge to relax or rent for events!
Pet Policy
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $200/per pet.
No pet rent!
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your
private tour of our available floor plans!

description: Five bedrooms and 5.5 bathrooms! Available September 1. title: Make Your New Move
description:
Summer is right around the corner, come spend it with us!
Monthly Rent: 2 Bedrooms start at $1,500 and up
Application Fee: $50 per person
Square Footage: 610 to 800 Sq Feet
Lease Term: Flexible - Please Inquire!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $19.99/month
Unique Features such as:
- Online Resident Portal
- Package Concierge
- Secure Entry with FOB
- Enclosed Community Courtyard with gazebo, firepit, lawn games and grill!
- Individual Climate Control
Our Amenities include:
- Loading Zone for all your shopping needs
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Laundry Card or App Payment for our recently renovated 24/7 Laundromat located within the building with elevator access on most floors
- Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
Each Apartment features:
- fully renovated with spacious granite countertops, modern backsplash, and a large kitchen sink with a garbage disposal
- stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, glass top range, and an upright fridge/freezer
- each room's climate is controlled by its own high-efficiency electric heat/AC unit so no worrying about not being comfortable
- the flooring is PVC flooring throughout the rooms & tile in the bathroom
The neighborhood:
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Ave., there are a number of cafes, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with indoor bicycle racks, too!
Pet Policy:
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $200/per pet.
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. We are also currently offering virtual tours via Facetime. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your
private tour of our available floor plans!

title: well maintained one bedroom and one bathroom unit on mill street
description: Location location location! Welcome home to this well maintained one bedroom and one bathroom unit on the most sought after block on Mill Street. Imagine living in a small town where you can walk to the local restaurants, shops and brewery's. The owner has kept up with this home over the years constantly maintaining and upgrading. As you enter, you notice the cork flooring runs continually thru the entire unit and beautiful river views from all the windows. Newer solid wood shaker kitchen cabinets, countertops and tile backsplash complimented with stainless steel appliances. Nine foot ceilings through out with neutral paint colors. As you walk down the hallway past the kitchen, there is the first bedroom to the right. Plenty of natural sunlight, ceiling fan and large closet. Continuing down the hallway, a larger linen closet for storage. The common hall bathroom features a large whirlpool tub, pedestal sink and newer lighting fixtures. At the end of the hallway is the utility closet that has a stackable washer and dryer and water heater. Turning right into the master bedroom the first thing you notice is the tray vaulted high ceilings and plenty of natural light. There is a large walk-in closet with plenty of storage. The master bathroom has been renovated with a large custom tile shower, tile floors and newer bathroom vanity. This unit also has a dedicated in door parking space in the garage where the elevator is conveniently located. Conveniently located near I-95, the PA turnpike, the Burlington- Bristol bridge as well as the Bristol train station.

Second floor consists of three spacious bedrooms with high ceiling and its own closet. Master bedroom situated at front with bay shape windows which provide plenty of sunlight. Additionally, it s surrounded by a few local neighborhood parks such as Power Park, Cohocksink Recreation Center and Campbell Square Park.
